```{r parallel_cont, fig.asp = 1.2}
library(cartogram)
library(sf)
library(tmap)

data("World")

# keep only the african continent
afr <- World[World$continent == "Africa", ]

# project the map
afr <- st_transform(afr, 3395)

# Create cartogram using 2 CPU cores on local machine
afr_cont <- cartogram_cont(afr, weight = "pop_est", itermax = 5, show_progress = TRUE, n_cpu = 2)

# plot it
tm_shape(afr_cont) +
  tm_polygons("pop_est",
            fill.scale = tm_scale_intervals(style = "jenks")) +
  tm_layout(frame = FALSE,
            legend.position = c("left", "bottom"))
```
